title: Kushner Raising Money for Central America, Raising Tesla’s Solar Roof, Curaleaf CEO on Deal Making
itunes:title: Kushner Raising Money for Central America, Raising Tesla’s Solar Roof, Curaleaf CEO on Deal Making
description:
Bloomberg News Latin America Reporter Eric Martin explains that White House senior adviser Jared Kushner is organizing an investment conference in Mexico City, aiming to pair private money with foreign aid for Central America. Bloomberg News Bond Reporter Liz Capo McCormick discusses how Apple's revenue warning is driving more investors into government debt. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Dana Hull talk about how Tesla's solar roof batteries are exciting drivers and investors alike. Curaleaf CEO Joe Lusardi shares his thoughts on multi-state operations in the cannabis space. And we Drive to the Close with Eric Clark, Portfolio Manager at Rational Dynamic Brands Fund.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
